#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
using namespace std;
main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        char s[11];
        cin>>s;
        int l=strlen(s);
        int q=0,count=0;
        for(int i=l-1;i>=0;i--)
        {
            if(s[i]==s[q++])
                count+=1;
        }
        if(count==l)
            cout<<"YES\n";
        else
            cout<<"NO\n";
    }

}
